Packages that use SimilaritySearch

Description
com.oracle.coherence.ai.search
Contains classes for Coherence AI vector database Knn search functionality.

Contains various generic utilities.

  • Uses of SimilaritySearch in com.oracle.coherence.ai.search

    Methods in com.oracle.coherence.ai.search that return SimilaritySearch
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SimilaritySearch<K,V,T>
    SimilaritySearch.algorithm(DistanceAlgorithm<T> algorithm)
    Set the algorithm to use for distance calculation between vectors.
    SimilaritySearch<K,V,T>
    SimilaritySearch.bruteForce()
    Force brute force search, ignoring any available indexes.
    SimilaritySearch<K,V,T>
    SimilaritySearch.filter(Filter<?> filter)
    Set the filter to use to limit the set of entries to search.

  • Uses of SimilaritySearch in com.tangosol.util

    Methods in com.tangosol.util that return SimilaritySearch
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <K, V, T> SimilaritySearch<K,V,T>
    Aggregators.similaritySearch(ValueExtractor<? super V,? extends Vector<T>> extractor, Vector<T> vector, int maxResults)
    Return a SimilaritySearch aggregator that will use cosine distance to calculate and return up to maxResults results that are closest to the specified vector.
